        A RouteX object gets examined, eventually parsed into a Route object and added to the RoutingTable
        Parameters:
        routeX -
        Returns:
        true if a new route was added, false if not because no Route could be created or this route already exists.

        public static RouteX prepareToForward(RouteX routeX)
        Prepares a RouteX object to be forwarded. Sets down the TimeToLive, if not 0! Count up the hops if has this variable.
        Parameters:
        routeX - RouteX
        Returns:
        the modified RouteX object
